import {useState,useEffect} from "react" import axios from 'axios'; const InitialScreen = () => { // Componet logic const [films,useFilms] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const promise = axios.get("https://mock-api.driven.com.br/api/v5/cineflex/movies"); promise.then((response) => { console.log(response.data) useFilms(response.data.posterURL) } ); },[]) // Component UI return (

Selecione o filme

{}
); } export default InitialScreen
